      • removeProgressListener

        public void removeProgressListener(ProgressListener progressListener)
        Description copied from interface: ProgressListenable
        Removes a progress listener. If the listener was not previously registered with ProgressListenable.addProgressListener(ProgressListener), or has already been removed, then nothing happens.
        Specified by:
        removeProgressListener in interface ProgressListenable
        Parameters:
        progressListener - The listener to remove. Must not be null.
